name: Golden Ring Hotel

reviews.text: For the money I paid I would really have expected the service to be a little more polite. I have been to Russia before, so I wasn't expecting Western standards: however the staff seemed very stand-offish.
reviews.title: Service without a smile

reviews.text: The room itself was fine, although it was very expensive (perhaps not for Moscow, but certainly compared to what I normally pay).
reviews.title: Not too bad!

reviews.text: By far the best thing about this hotel is the location. The views were fantastic, and we were just a short walk from most of the main tourist sites.
reviews.title: Loved the Golden Ring
Golden Ring Hotel
reviews.text: I did not really know what to expect from a Moscow hotel.

reviews.title: Much better than expected
reviews.text: Location seemed fine, when I was there it was windy, snowing and -7 degrees, so I did not venture out much.

This is a very clean hotel, but the service is COLD. For a short stay, this hotel is fine, but would not recommend for longer stays. Do NOT use the salon - rude service, poor quality and overpriced. Location is good for shopping and sightseeing.
reviews.title: Clean but cold

reviews.text: Stayed in the Goldenring for 3 nights on a business trip to Moscow. The junior suite I stayed in is rather "junior". Acute shortage of leg space for sure. The staff members of the hotel are helpful in a very stiff faced, tough guys manner and there are security guards all around the place, makes you feel a bit uncomfortable..
reviews.title: Cannot be called 5 star..
Great Hotel
reviews.text: The lobby is good (but then why do you need a lobby for) but rooms needs upgrade and renovation. An average business hotel, can be termed as a good 3 star but never a one with 5.
I stayed in this hotel for a week while stopping over in Moscow.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, excellent location
top class
reviews.text: The room was fantastic, clean, comfortable with a great view of the city (the upper floors are the best).

description: Welcome to the Golden Ring Hotel!We invite you to enjoy the following services: accommodation booking, best offers of buffet breakfast in Moscow, panoramic restaurants located on top floors, dedicated weekend brunches, banquet halls, conference halls with equipment and catering options, fitness and Spa, secured garage parking, tire fitting and car wash, hi-end Japanese restaurant.
